trans-unit.source: Provides a factory class that creates instances of the authentication service, role service, and profile service in managed hosting environments.

This factory class provides a way to create instances of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> classes.
To use this factory class, create a WCF Service (.svc) file and specify ApplicationServicesHostFactory in the `ServiceHosting` attribute of the `@ ServiceHost` directive.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory"></xref> class.
Creates an instance of the service class that has the specified base address or addresses.
Usually this method is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] as part of service activation, and you do not have to call the method manually.
The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> instance for the type of service that has the specified base address or addresses.
